actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution relating the disapproval of the waiver by the Secretary of the Treasury of the imposition of countervailing duties on imports of leather handbags from Brazil.

summary.text: Disapproves of the waiver by the Secretary of the Treasury of the imposition of countervailing duties on imports of leather handbags from Brazil under the Tariff Act of 1930, transmitted to the Congress on July 19, 1976.

titles.title: A resolution relating the disapproval of the waiver by the Secretary of the Treasury of the imposition of countervailing duties on imports of leather handbags from Brazil.
